title: ESDI
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922062624/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922062624/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : Escola Superior de Desenho Industrial**

Founded in 1963, Escola Superior de Desenho Industrial (ESDI) was the first design college in Brazil and in Latin America.

The undergraduate course consists of a five-year programme of full-time study, covering both product design and graphic design.

ESDI's Master's Degree Course started in 2005.

[http://www.esdi.uerj.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922062624/http:/www.esdi.uerj.br/)
author: Miguel Sousa
